Articles.Content:
Hey all,

Just checking in here to say hi and say KPS rocks!

Trying to figure out how to get in orbit before I attempt anything else, I\'m happy to have a rocket that doesn\'t crash in a second...which I know remember, I did not save...
I\'m planning on making an orbit tutorial and possibly a Mun landing tutorial, I will keep you posted if I make it

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Welcome to the forums!

Hope you don\'t fail as much as me!

JupiterII
